com.canoo.dolphin.client.javafx

Class DolphinPlatformApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • com.canoo.dolphin.client.javafx.DolphinPlatformApplication

  • public abstract class DolphinPlatformApplication
extends Application
    Defines a basic application class for Dolphin Platform based applications that can be used like the Application class. Next to the general Application class of JavaFX this class supports the DOlphin Platform connecttion lifecycle.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws Exception
        Creates the connection to the Dolphin Platform server. If this method will be overridden always call the super method.
        Overrides:
        init in class Application
        Throws:
        Exception - a exception if the connection can't be created

      • getClientConfiguration

        protected JavaFXConfiguration getClientConfiguration()
        Returns the Dolphin Platform configuration for the client. As long as all the default configurations can be used this method don't need to be overridden. The URL of the server will be configured by the getServerEndpoint() method.
        Returns:
        The Dolphin Platform configuration for this client

      • getServerEndpoint

        protected abstract URL getServerEndpoint()
                                  throws MalformedURLException
        Returns the server url of the Dolphin Platform server endpoint.
        Returns:
        the server url
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException

      • start

        public final void start(Stage primaryStage)
                 throws Exception
        This methods defines parts of the Dolphin Platform lifecyycle and is therefore defined as final. Use the start(Stage, ClientContext) method instead.
        Specified by:
        start in class Application
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the primary stage
        Throws:
        Exception - in case of an error

      • start

        protected abstract void start(Stage primaryStage,
                              com.canoo.dolphin.client.ClientContext clientContext)
                       throws Exception
        This method must be defined by each application to create the initial view. The method will be called on the JavaFX Platform thread after the connection to the DOlphin Platform server has been created.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the primary stage
        clientContext - the Dolphin Platform context
        Throws:
        Exception - in case of an error

      • stop

        public final void stop()
                throws Exception
        Whenever JavaFX calls the stop method the connection to the Dolphin Platform server will be closed.
        Overrides:
        stop in class Application
        Throws:
        Exception - an error

      • reconnect

        protected final void reconnect(Stage primaryStage)

      • onInitializationError

        protected void onInitializationError(Stage primaryStage,
                                     com.canoo.dolphin.client.ClientInitializationException initializationException)
        This method is called if the connection to the Dolphin Platform server can't be created. Application developers can define some kind of error handling here. By default the methods prints the exception in the log an call System.exit(int)
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the primary stage
        initializationException - the exception

      • onRuntimeError

        protected void onRuntimeError(Stage primaryStage,
                              com.canoo.dolphin.client.DolphinRuntimeException runtimeException)
        This method is called if the connection to the Dolphin Platform server throws an exception at runtime. This can for example happen if the server is shut down while the client is still running or if the server responses with an error code.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the primary stage
        runtimeException - the exception

      • onShutdownError

        protected void onShutdownError(com.canoo.dolphin.client.ClientShutdownException shutdownException)
        This method is called if the connection to the Dolphin Platform server can't be closed on Application.stop(). Application developers can define some kind of error handling here. By default the methods prints the exception in the log an call System.exit(int)
        Parameters:
        shutdownException -
